titleStmt.title: 2[o] Decembris. 1646. An ordinance of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament for the better observation of the monethly fast
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husbands, Printer to the Honourable House of Commons,

notesStmt.note: Order to print signed: Hen. Elsynge Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Bracketed "o" in title is in superscript.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
